title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource, the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
EB: I expect the Team entry to be present in the context menu when trying to sync a .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the context menu for a .java file and another resource.
2. Check if the Team entry is present in the menu. It should be.
